enb_long_title: Seventh Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: On Wednesday afternoon, MOROCCO'S CHILDREN'S PARLIAMENT, FRANCOPHONE YOUNG PEOPLE'S PARLIAMENT, and the WORLD YOUTH ORGANIZATION ON CLIMATE CHANGE gave presentations, with the final speaker urging a move toward a low carbon-emitting future, entry into force of the Protocol as the start of a 'long path' in combating climate change, and completion at COP-7 of decision texts without weakening the Bonn Agreements.
